title: Gut microbiome may play a role in DNA methylation during weight loss
author: News Medical
description: Research by data scientists in the Department of Biomedical Informatics and others in the CU School of Medicine aims to understand the relationship between changes in diet and the microbiome. Some of this work uncovers possible routes by which alterations in gut microbiota may influence metabolism during a dietary weight loss intervention.
sitename: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus
